improveOurRulesQuoteBlock.label: Help improve our Rules
improveOurRulesQuoteBlock.quote: The SSW Rules website works just like Wikipedia. If you think something should be changed, hit the pencil icon and make an edit! Or if you are cool [tweet me](https://twitter.com/adamcogan)
